description:
When threatening letters demand that a movie production be shut down, Ryo is delighted to take on the job of protecting the 20 young women who are auditioning for a major role.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A beach to Remember - An Audition Full of Danger
Omoide no Nagisa: Audition wa Kiken ga Ippai
思い出の渚 オーディションは危険がいっぱい
